body:
Since Spack has control over basically any dependency that can be build inside a user's `.local/`, setting the environment var [`PYTHONNOUSERSITE`](https://docs.python.org/2/using/cmdline.html#environment-variables) (or `PYTHONUSERBASE=/dev/null`) for python installs (and loads) (Python 2.6+ feature) could help to isolate our installs better from the outside world™.

Any concerns?

ccing @tgamblin @hartzell @junghans @alalazo @adamjstewart 

Related (tricky) issues:
- https://github.com/pypa/setuptools/issues/1229
- https://github.com/spack/spack/issues/6558
title: Set PYTHONNOUSERSITE?
